trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_SEQ_00<tab>Urianger is quite glad for your company.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Urianger.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_01<tab>Stand watch at the designated location and defeat any enemies that appear.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_02<tab>Stand watch at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Urianger.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_05<tab>Search for Runningway at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_000<tab>I thank thee for accompanying me.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_001<tab>'Tis a simple plan, in truth. We shall not be long away from Bestways Burrow.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_002<tab>Difficult decisions must needs be made in the coming days, but I nevertheless believe we are all of one mind in our desire to save the people of Etheirys.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_003<tab>To make clear our resolve to the Loporrits, I would offer them a gift. But its making doth require a most singular ingredient.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_010<tab>Ah, an abundance of spongoi. Excellent.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_011<tab>I chanced to spy this aggregation when crossing Zodiark's erstwhile prison.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_012<tab>Using a spell taught to me by the Nu Mou, I believe these shall suffice for the gift I would fashion.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_013<tab>The magick requireth considerable concentration, however. Might I prevail upon thee to stand watch whilst I perform the incantation?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_020<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Urianger is wholly absorbed in weaving his enchantment. Until his work is complete, he will need to be kept safe from harm...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Surveying the nearby area, you see no sign of potential threats. This would be a good opportunity to see how Urianger is faring...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_040<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Urianger remains fixated on his work...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_042<tab>There... 'Tis done.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_043<tab>A magicked ink, every onze as efficacious as that crafted by the Nu Mou.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_044<tab>Rare is the occasion I would conjure mine own, but is nevertheless a most useful skill.

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_045<tab>The resulting product is, admittedly, possessed of no preternatural properties, but its hue is one of mine own choosing, which I pray the Loporrits will appreciate.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_046<tab>(-???-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Urianger! Oh, thank goodness. I thought you had been eaten, or had perhaps fallen into a crater.

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_047<tab>Y'shtola has been looking all over for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. She says she needs to speak with you about something most urgent. Dire, even.

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_048<tab>She was also quite clear that she wishes to speak with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> <var 1A 02 /var>alone<var 1A 01 /var>. Which means, I'm afraid, you must stay behind, Urianger.

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_049<tab>But worry not! It just so happens we need your help with an errand─delivering a package from the Watcher's Palace to Bestways Burrow. It's quite large and heavy─perhaps even too heavy, for we poor Loporrits─and we would be ever so grateful if you could lend us a hand.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_Q1_000_050<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_A1_000_051<tab>Well, I suppose I should be going, then...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_A1_000_052<tab>How about an extra pair of hands before I go and meet with Y'shtola?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_A1_000_053<tab>That's convenient... <var 1A 02 /var>Suspiciously<var 1A 01 /var> convenient.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_054<tab>Phew, good...

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_055<tab>I-I mean, yes, very good. Let us not keep you, then. She said she would be waiting for you in Greatest Endsvale...or somewhere thereabouts. I'm sure you'll find her soon enough.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_056<tab>No, no, that won't be necessary. Urianger's help should more than suffice.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_057<tab>And I'm sure you don't want to risk getting on Y'shtola's bad side by keeping her waiting. She seems...prickly. Now, off with you.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_058<tab>Are you insinuating I would betray the trust of Hydaelyn's chosen? Or worse─do anything to risk getting on Y'shtola's bad side!?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_LIVINGWAY_000_059<tab>She's clearly not one to be crossed, nor made to wait. Now, off with you!
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_URIANGER_000_060<tab>Worry not, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I shan't be long.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_THANCRED_000_070<tab>Everything is all right with Urianger, then? That's a relief.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_075<tab>Oh! B-Back so soon?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We thought you would be away for far longer.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_081<tab>A dire emergency? I said no such thing.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_082<tab>But as you are here, I could use your assistance with one small matter.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_083<tab>Runningway, a companion of Growingway's, apparently has much to tell us of the Final Days.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_084<tab>The problem, however, is that he is determined to live up to his name, refusing to stay still long enough for us to hold a conversation.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_THANCRED_000_085<tab>Is there anywhere he's likely to stop and rest? Or perhaps there's a way to slow him down?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_086<tab>Wh-What's the rush? I was thinking we should wait here, maybe enjoy a cold mug of carrot juice, and...no? <sigh> Well, if it's really that important...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_087<tab>You can try using these...balls. Of mousse flesh. Not to be confused with...the other thing.

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_088<tab>Ahem. Runningway's other notable feature is his incessant chatter, so you'll have no trouble finding him in a crowd. And when you do, try lobbing your balls at him.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_089<tab>Crude, but if it proves effective... He was here in Greatest Endsvale when last I saw him. Let us split up and find him.

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>Search your surroundings for Runningway. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target Runningway and throw mousse balls with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var>/<var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_101<tab>Hm? Yes, I'm Runningway. Do you mind explaining why you hit me in the face with your balls... Of mousse flesh?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_102<tab><var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> highly knowledgeable about the Final Days?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_103<tab>Hah, that's the most ridiculous thing I've heard since I woke up! Who told you that joke?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_104<tab>As if we've got time to look into the Final Days when there's so much to do before the great voyage.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_105<tab>It's true that Hydaelyn did impart to us some knowledge of the event, but I know about as much as any other Loporrit around here. Less, probably.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_106<tab>I don't know why anyone would think it's funny to go around telling people I'm an expert, but they'd better hope I don't get my paws on them!
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_107<tab>Sorry I couldn't be of more help, but if there's nothing else, I've work to do!
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_RUNNINGWAY_000_108<tab>And I'm off!
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_THANCRED_000_110<tab>Any luck? I tried near the entrance, but there was no sign of him.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_115<tab>Oh no, you caught him? I-I mean... Well done you...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_120<tab>I could find neither hide nor...hair of him. How did you fare?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_121<tab>So, he knows no more than the others.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_YSHTOLA_000_122<tab>Care to explain yourself, Growingway?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_123<tab>W-Well, you see... I, uh...
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_124<tab>I misremembered. Yes, that's it! I misremembered. Terribly sorry about that.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_125<tab>Hmmm. Afraid I'm drawing a blank, though. Try as I might, I can't remember who I was thinking of.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_THANCRED_000_126<tab>On an unrelated note, what of Urianger? I assume you spoke with him earlier, but did he say when he'll be returning?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_THANCRED_000_127<tab>On his way to the Watcher's Palace with Livingway?
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_THANCRED_000_128<tab>Between Growingway's sudden lapse of memory and our lack of other leads, maybe our time would be better spent lending Urianger a hand.
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_129<tab>Wh-What!? Now hold on a moment!
TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_130<tab>It's all coming back to me. Yes, I remember!

TEXT_AKTKMC108_04406_GROWINGWAY_000_131<tab>The information you're looking for is in the archives. Yes, that's where you'll find all sorts of useful knowledge, including that pertaining to the Final Days.
